title: If F1 went retro for 75th anniversary: a classic livery for each team
summary: MotoGP celebrated 75 years of the motorcycle world championship last year at Silverstone with each of its 12 teams racing in classic liveries, inspired by memorable years or title-winning figuresâ€¦

qa_pairs.question: What is a livery in the context of Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A livery refers to the design and color scheme of a Formula 1 team's car.
wrong_options: The engine type used by the team.
The driver lineup for the season.
The pit stop strategy employed during a race.

qa_pairs.question: Which Formula 1 team is known for its iconic red color scheme?
What significant milestone did MotoGP celebrate in the previous year?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: 75 years of the motorcycle world championship.
